text: Pollution can be checked, navigation can be improved, and new sources of cheaper power can be developed, for your factories and farms and homes. These are all things that you the people of this valley can do with the right kind of cooperation from your towns and cities, and your GPE and ORG. Now ORG has always believed that the Government exists to help the people do the things they cannot get done by themselves. We want to give the people of this valley and all New England whatever help you yourselves desire in building up the resources of this great countryside. That is what we have done in other river basins, helping people make the most of their fine rivers. ORG has exactly the opposite philosophy. They believe it is the purpose of Government to help special private interests exploit our national resources for their own private profit. If the NORP take control in GPE, they will not help you with your navigation problems, or stream pollution, or power-for that might interfere with the enrichment of the manufacturers and the utilities who like things to stay as they are. Do not be fooled by scare stories that somebody in GPE wants to come up here and take this river away from you, or take control of it. They are just afraid you might stand up someday and take control of your resources yourselves. The truth is you can develop and control this river yourselves, and a NORP government will cooperate with your local and ORG authorities to help you do it. Then you will really own the river, and be able to enjoy it the way you should, and make it work for you, in your interest, and not in the interests of private power. Now DATE comes in DATE, as you know, on DATE, and DATE is the time when the people of GPE exercise the control of their Government. If you do not take an interest, if you do not get yourselves registered, if you do not go to the polls on DATE, and you have bad government, you have nobody in the world to blame but yourselves. So, if you are going to do right by yourselves, if you are going to do right by your country, if you are going to help the world situation to come out without a third world war, you will go to the polls on DATE and you will vote for PERSON and PERSON, and we will have DATE of good government. I am more than happy to see you again. When I was here in DATE, I was trying to get myself elected President.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: Now I am back working for somebody else. I am working for the whole NORP ticket, and I hope you will vote for all of them. You have a very, very fine slate of NORP candidates here in GPE. For the ORG you have PERSON and PERSON, CARDINAL very able and decent persons. For ORG you have PERSON. He did a fine job in GPE, prosecuting the NORP war criminals, and a very good job back home in ORG. I know he will be a good prosecutor for your interests if you send him to GPE. You have a very, very fine gentleman running for Congressman at Large in PERSON. Now, on our national ticket, PERSON and PERSON are very fine men, with great progressive records of public service. They both have shown that they care about the problems of the plain everyday people of this country. I hope you have been listening to Governor PERSON's speeches. I hope you will go and hear him speak when he comes back to New England. He is talking sense to the NORP people, telling everybody where he stands on all the issues. Now there is a little thing I want to mention to you just quietly and under the cover I hope ORG is still in operation. I know the ORG was keeping up its headquarters in GPE DATE. And I hope the ORG is all set for some emergencies just in case something happens DATE that we do not expect. Because now I am going to give you some quotations now these are not my remarks at all, these are quotes because if the NORP should win this election, the ORG is going to have lots of business after DATE. And this is what they said themselves. At least that is what they say about each other, in GPE, and you would not find me to be one that would deny it. At the Republican Convention DATE, there were CARDINAL groups that had a whale of a fight with one another. CARDINAL side was the so-called liberal wing of the party, with a lot of NORP in it. Now you may remember the so-called liberals spent their time calling the PERSON men a bunch of rustlers. And the PERSON men returned the compliment with interest, I will say. The so-called liberals were successful so PERSON said in stealing the big prize at GPE. They took the nomination away from PERSON and gave it to a very famous general.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: The General kicked out the people who had got him nominated, and he surrendered, lock, stock, and barrel to the PERSON crowd the rustlers they had been all so mad about. He surrendered to PERSON. He embraced PERSON. He brought PERSON on the train, and now they are running his campaign for him. It is hard to say who won the battle at GPE. A vote for the NORP DATE is a vote for PERSON, for PERSON's foreign policy, for PERSON's labor policy, for PERSON's domestic policies in general. He has said so, and the General has backed him up. Now that would be a terrible thing for this country, just as those liberal GPE NORP agreed that it would when they fought PERSON at GPE. It would be bad for the country and the peace of the world, and it would be very bad for you. If you will use your judgment, if you will do a little thinking, if you will look at the record, if you compare the men at the head of each ticket, you will vote for yourselves. You are the Government, and if you vote for your own interests, if you vote for the welfare of this great GPE of ours, which is the most powerful Nation in the history of the world, if you will vote for the welfare of this great Nation, and vote for the welfare of the free countries of the world, you will vote the NORP ticket on DATE, and the Government will be safe DATE . I certainly am highly pleased to be here again, and I am more than highly pleased at the warmth of this reception. I did not think you would be out looking for a has-been, to see what he would took like, and I feel highly complimented that you were willing to come out and hear me discuss the issues. I am trying to put before the people just exactly what the issues are, and when they know what they are, they will know what to do. You have shown by your voting record that you know ORG is the party that really works for the people. Maybe I had better tell you, though. I am campaigning for the NORP ticket. I am working in CARDINAL of my CARDINAL jobs as the head of ORG. You have an excellent slate of NORP here in GPE. For ORG, PERSON I am sure he will do the same kind of first-class job for you in GPE that PERSON has done.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: Now, I understand you are going to elect Mr. PERSON State treasurer DATE. From what he has shown us in GPE, I know he will be a good one. We also have a candidate for ORG in the first District with us on this train, PERSON. I know he will make a good Representative of that district, for the ORG. You have a fine young man in the candidate for the ORG, and we certainly do need some young blood in that ORG. Young PERSON is a man who has already rendered great service to this GPE in ORG, and will keep up the good work in the ORG. For Governor you do not need my telling you anything about PERSON for Governor. He is as fine a NORP leader who will continue his excellent work in the State capital. I want to say a word about the national ticket now, if I may. Here in GPE you have already had a chance to see Governor PERSON and listen to what he has to say. He is one of the outstanding men in public service in our generation. When he speaks to the people, he gives them the straight story. PERSON is a man of great integrity and real feeling for the everyday people of this country. He is a man you can trust in ORG. That is also true of PERSON. He is one of our most progressive leaders in the ORG. He has proved by his record of DATE in the ORG and ORG that he can be trusted to work for all the people. While I am here this happens to be PERSON hometown, and while I am talking about men who have given great service to the NORP people, I want to pay tribute to this hometown's man of yours the former mayor of GPE, PERSON. PERSON has been down in GPE for DATE now, handling the tough job of Economic Stabilizer. He took over that assignment just after the NORP had finished their first hatchet job on our price and wage controls. He has since lived through another attempted slaughter by the NORP, and he has done a grand job in helping to stabilize our economy in spite of all the NORP obstruction. I suppose you know that the NORP candidate for President has been going around the country moaning about the high prices we are paying DATE, and blaming it all on the NORP administration. Of course, he does not dare mention the voting record of ORG.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: Maybe nobody's told him that his party in ORG has a long, unbroken record of trying to kill or cripple price and wage and rent controls at every chance they have. Back in DATE when we needed controls, until our civilian production got back to normal, the NORP voted almost to a man to kill controls. They finally succeeded, and the cost of living went up PERCENT in DATE, just as I predicted it would. I am sure you all remember that period, the worst inflationary rise in the history of the country. In DATE and DATE I tried to get price control authority back on the statute books, but the NORP good-for-nothing 80th ORG just laughed at my efforts. Then the NORP emergency came along, and by the time we got a controls bill passed and the stabilization agencies established, the cost of living had gone up PERCENT in DATE. Then in DATE, we got a general price freeze put on. And what did the NORP do, once we put a lid on prices? They began a vicious attack on the basic price control legislation. In DATE they put across the Capehart amendment which by now has added MONEY in higher prices to the NORP people. DATE the NORP Senators voted CARDINAL to CARDINAL to curtail price rollbacks, and CARDINAL to CARDINAL to prevent effective control of black marketing in meat. DATE the NORP Congressmen voted CARDINAL to CARDINAL to scuttle all price controls, and CARDINAL to CARDINAL to end all rent controls. And then to top it all off, in DATE, and again DATE, the NORP ganged up with a few NORP to slash appropriations so that the remaining control authority could not be properly enforced against the chiselers and the profiteers. Despite these NORP attempts to wreck controls, we have been doing a pretty good job to keep inflation down. In DATE, the cost of living has risen PERCENT. Prices are higher than they ought to be, and I told you why. But in spite of high prices, most people are better off than they ever were before. The dollar does not buy as much as it once did, but people have a lot more dollars to buy with. The income has gone up a lot faster than prices in DATE twice as fast, in fact. The PERSON dollars were worth a lot, all right, but it took many people DATE labor to earn CARDINAL of them.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: And CARDINAL of our fellow citizens who were unemployed were not able to earn anything at all. So the PERSON dollar did not do them a bit of good. The NORP have given this country CARDINAL terrible demonstrations of how they can drive prices down. In DATE they got prices down PERCENT in a big hurry and there were CARDINAL people out of work. In DATE they got prices down PERCENT in DATE-and it took CARDINAL unemployed to do that. Any time you hear their candidate talk about cutting prices, and bringing back that PERSON dollar, you had better stop and think how the NORP go about those things. In the first effort they made CARDINAL unemployed. In the next effort they made CARDINAL unemployed, and if you give them another chance, you will probably have CARDINAL. You will not get steady prices from an outfit like that boom and bust is their stock in trade. Their record speaks for itself. They will not look out for your jobs, your income, or the prices you have to pay. The Constitution provides that the power of government rests in the people, and when the people exercise their right to vote, they exercise the power that controls the Government. Now I am going around the country trying to get the people to think, trying to get people to read the record. I am trying to get them to remember that the record made in the ORG by the NORP in ORG is the record on which they have to run. They do not want to run on that record. I want you also to study the record of the NORP in ORG. The majority of the NORP in ORG have always been for the people, and they always will be for the people. Now, if you want to look out for your own interests, if you want to look out for the welfare of this great GPE of ours, if you want to look out for the welfare of the free nations of the world, and to keep the world free, and to keep communism from this country, the way to do that is to vote for the party that has always been against communism, that has always fought them and convicted them. We have taken action-we have not just talked about it and smeared people just for the benefit of a few headlines. Vote the NORP ticket and the country will be safe DATE. I cannot tell you how much I appreciate this most cordial welcome. I was here DATE when I was campaigning for myself.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: I am campaigning this time just as hard as I was then, because this is one of the most important elections we ever had, and if it is at all possible, I am more anxious that we win this election than I was in DATE and that is saying a lot. The reason I feel that way, I think this is the most important election this country has had since the War Between the States. Now, you have a wonderful slate of NORP running for office here in GPE. You have PERSON for the ORG. I know him very well. I knew his father before him. He has made a wonderful public servant in the ORG of Representatives, and he will give you the right kind of representation in the ORG. Then for ORG you have PERSON, who has a record that does not need me to tell you about. Your Governor has made a record on which you should endorse him overwhelmingly, and I know you will. And I understand that we are in the hometown of your Lieutenant Governor and you know more about him than I do, so use your judgment, and I know you will send him back. Now ORG is exceedingly fortunate in having CARDINAL great men to head its ticket DATE PERSON and PERSON. They can stand on their records of long service in the public interest. They are men of integrity and conscience, and they will work in the great tradition of ORG. I have been all across the country from coast to coast in DATE, and I have seen a very prosperous country. This prosperity we have seems to be driving the NORP crazy. They just cannot understand how the country can be prosperous with NORP in office. The NORP candidate for President has been doing his best to prove that this prosperity does not exist, that it is all done with mirrors. Now if you can beat that, I will pay it on the line. But he knows people will not believe that. So he has been trying to get across the notion that the NORP do not know how to keep the country prosperous except by spending money on national defense. It is just CARDINAL more NORP falsehood to scare you and confuse you in this campaign. I am out here to tell you the truth. Everywhere I go I see signs or people yelling Give 'em hell, PERSON.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: Well now, that is an awful reputation for a good NORP to get, and I am telling you what I am doing I am telling the truth and giving you the issues, and that is a lot worse than giving the NORP hell, because they cannot stand the truth. Right now we have a total national production of MONEY. Defense accounts for CARDINAL of that output. Now in DATE, after the NORP folded up, I organized a commission to look into the return to civil affairs after World War II; and I sent that committee-CARDINAL of them, CARDINAL of them was Senator PERSON of GPE to see Senator PERSON, who was then the NORP leader in the ORG. I had them ask him what his remedy was we had decided that we needed a MONEY income if we were going to keep people at work. PERSON said that was impossible, we would never reach MONEY income, and the best thing to do was to take all the women out of work and let the men do the work, and then this country could go along and everybody would have jobs. Now, if that is not one for the book, I do not know what is. And he is running their present nominee for President. Now, defense accounts for CARDINAL of that MONEY output. If it were not for the defense effort, we would be even more prosperous than we are now. The defense effort is making us postpone and put off a lot of things we need, things that will make our country greater and stronger. Our population is growing fast, our cities are growing that means lots of things to do. We need a lot of redevelopment in our cities. We need more houses, better and cheaper houses, more roads, more schools, more hospitals. Out West where I have been, we need a lot more dams and irrigation works, and all those things. We need more food, and more consumers goods of every kind. CARDINAL of businessmen are ready now to expand their plants or build new ones. They see bigger markets ahead. In the city of GPE, where you make all kinds of things, and know how to adapt your production fast, there will surely be a lot of good work for you, when defense tapers off. This means there need be no depression in this country, and there will not be, if you keep the kind of government in GPE that understands these things and will help get new production going in the right places at the right time.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: That is CARDINAL thing that ORG knows how to do. They have shown it. Remember DATE when things started to slide back, we took quick action then, and by DATE we were in boom times again. The defense buildup had nothing whatever to do with it. But the NORP are right about CARDINAL thing. They are experts in depression organization. The last time they held office, we had CARDINAL depressions in DATE. They do not seem to have any notion of how to get prosperity and growth. For DATE the NORP have been voting against almost everything the NORP have done to help build this country up. Unfortunately, their candidate for President could not change them if he wanted to. He has been a fine general, but the ENTITY is all he has ever known in his whole life. You do not learn much in the ENTITY about what workers and farmers need, or what it takes to keep the country going. If you have never milked a cow, or ploughed a corn row, if you have never worked with your hands, you never can tell what the country needs. And a man who has had social security all his life in the GPE ENTITY, does not know what it means to meet a payroll. And he does not know any more about politics than a babe in the woods. He is in the woods and PERSON has got the woods under control. The General is surrounded by the NORP Old Guard, and they have taken him to town. I do not think you can take a chance on turning your country over to an outfit like that. You are responsible for what sort of government we have. The Constitution provides that the power of the Government in this Republic rests in the people in you. Now, if you will study the issues and that is what I am out to get you to do I want you to satisfy yourselves, I am not trying to convert you to something unusual, I am trying to get you to look after your own interests. I am trying to get you to think about things. I want you to read the record. I want you to study the record of the NORP in ORG, which is what their policy will be. They have shown it by their votes. And I want you to study the NORP record in the ORG. That is what the NORP have done. That is what they will continue to do. And then I want you to go to the polls on DATE and vote for yourselves.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: And when you do that, you will put PERSON and PERSON in the Presidency and the Vice Presidency, and this country will be safe for DATE. I am very, very glad indeed to be in GPE here TIME. This is the home of CARDINAL of my very good friends, about whom I will speak in TIME. You people in GPE have a most wonderful slate of candidates running. For Senator, you have that able young Congressman, PERSON. He will make you a great Senator, and I want you to elect him. For ORG, you have had presented to you an able and distinguished Congressman, PERSON. You could not have a better one. And for Governor, you have PERSON. You know him by experience. He will make you a good Governor, and you cannot do anything else but elect him. We have a great candidate for President DATE, PERSON. He will give this country good government and real leadership. PERSON has served as Governor of a great GPE, and has proved his talents as a civilian administrator. He knows the problems of the people, and his experience in GPE shows that he knows how to make the Government work for the people. Now I have been in politics for DATE. I have had every reward that the people of the greatest Nation in the world can give to a man. I started in elective public office DATE DATE I was elected to my first elective public office. For DATE I have been in county government, I have been a GPE Senator, I have been Vice President and for DATE I have been President of GPE. And my ability, if I have any, to make that office function, has been, I think, a talent for picking the right man for the right place. Now CARDINAL of my CARDINAL secretaries comes from this city right here. You know him. You know what kind of man he is. He is able, efficient, honest, and he has been a tower of strength to the President of GPE. His name is PERSON-I do not need to tell you. Now, just for your welfare and information, and for the information of the country at large, I think I shall elaborate a little bit on the personnel of ORG in the administrative branch.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: There have been a great many misstatements made about the people who constitute the part of your Government that makes the Government work, and that is the administrative end of the Government. Now I have a Secretary of ORG, who was Assistant Secretary of the ORG, who was Under Secretary of ORG, who was the Vice Chairman of the ORG that wrote up the recommendations for the reorganization of the Government. He has made one of the greatest Secretaries of ORG that the country has ever had. I never was acquainted with him until I came to GPE. PERSON. I have a Secretary of the ORG who was the Director of ORG in World War II. He spent MONEY building the defense plants of this country, and every dollar of that MONEY went where it should go. And we won the war as a result of the effectiveness of ORG under PERSON. My Secretary of ORG was an Assistant Secretary of ORG under PERSON. He was an assistant in the reorganization of GPE. He has been Assistant Secretary of ORG. He is one of the ablest men that the Government has ever had; and his name is PERSON. And I never saw him until I picked him on account of his ability and efficiency. My Attorney General was the Assistant Attorney General of GPE under CARDINAL Attorneys General. He was Assistant to the Attorney General. I made him a Federal judge in GPE. And when the office of the Attorney General became vacant, I asked him to forego his lifetime job as a ORG judge and come back and become my Attorney General, and he did Judge PERSON. Then I have a Postmaster General who is unique in the history of GPE. He started as a letter carrier DATE. He has come up the line every step of the way. He was Assistant Postmaster General when there was a vacancy in ORG, and on account of his ability and efficiency, I made him Postmaster General the first career man ever to be made Postmaster General in the history of the country. Then I have PERSON, who was Under Secretary of the ORG under Mr. PERSON. And when Mr. PERSON quit, I made PERSON Secretary of the ORG. He knows more about ORG than any other man who has ever been in that job, and he does an excellent job for the ORG. Then I have a Secretary of ORG. He was in ORG for DATE.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: He knows ORG from top to bottom. He is the ablest Secretary of ORG that has ever been there, and I know something about it, because I started on the farm and I have known all the Secretaries of ORG for DATE and this is the best one we ever had. The Secretary of ORG is an able and distinguished lawyer and businessman from GPE, with whom I was not acquainted until I went to GPE, and at that time he was Ambassador to GPE. He was one of my advisers at GPE, and on account of his ability I made him Secretary of ORG-and he is a good one. Now in DATE, I had an able and distinguished former Senator and former ORG judge for Secretary of Labor PERSON. He suddenly passed away in DATE, DATE. Now you have a very able and distinguished citizen up here in GPE who had been the mayor of GPE, who had been Governor of the great State of GPE. And I asked him to come to see me, and I said to him, I want to place you in my ORG as Secretary of ORG. You are taking a chance. I may not be here except to the end of this term, but I would like very much for you to take ORG for me. And PERSON took it. And he has run it ever since. Now I have CARDINAL Presidential assistants. These are the ORG members that sit around the Cabinet table with me once or twice a week and discuss world affairs and national affairs. And we know where we are going, and what we are doing do not let anybody tell you anything else. CARDINAL of them was Ambassador at Large and in charge of the revival of Europe. He was Ambassador to GPE for DATE. He was Ambassador to GPE for DATE, and when I had a vacancy as Secretary of ORG, I telephoned him in GPE and brought him back here and made him Secretary of ORG. And when this NORP recovery program PERSON plan came up, I made him the civilian in charge of it. And he is now my assistant and Ambassador at Large to see that that plan comes to its final conclusion. And it has been a great success because we have kept all of Western Europe from going NORP by that PERSON plan. I have another assistant who has been with me nearly ever since I have been President of GPE. He is a coordinator of the difficulties that arise in the administrative end of the Government.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: He is a career man, and he has a Ph.D. He knows what he is doing, and he does an excellent job. Now, my friends, the reason I am rehashing this for you is because there never has been an organization about which so much misrepresentation and so many lies have been told as have been told about my Presidential family that runs ORG. Now I have CARDINAL Secretaries. I have a number of Executive assistants and every one of whom is as efficient and able as any group of men that could be gotten together. PERSON was the Deputy Chairman of the organization known as ORG, which wrote and recommended the plans for the efficient reorganization of the Government. I have set the administrative end of our Government on a more efficient basis than it has been since the Government was launched. I am not bragging, I am merely telling you facts. And I have sent more reorganization plans to ORG than all the other Presidents put together; and I have had more of them turned down by the NORP and a coalition of NORP who did not believe in the things that I want to do, than any other President has done. I am telling you all this so you will know the facts, and I am out here now for a specific purpose. I did not have to come out here and work for the election of a candidate for President. But with all the effort that has been put forth in DATE to give you a government of the people, and by the people, and for the people, I felt that it was my duty to come out here and put the issues in this campaign before you, the people. The NORP cannot discuss the issues because they do not dare. They have been wrong on every program that has come before the ORG of GPE where the interests of all the people are at stake. They will not talk about it. They want to go off on some side issue. The NORP candidate said he was going out on a crusade. He said that at GPE. But he did not know what the crusade was about until Senator PERSON told him. I feel terribly bad about having to say these things, because I was very fond of PERSON. I made him Chief of Staff of the GPE ENTITY. I sent him to Europe in command of the greatest organization that we are now making to keep the NORP from taking the world. If I had not had that confidence in him, of course I would not have done that.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: But he has come back here and he has thrown every principle that he is supposed to stand for out the window in the hope of buying votes he has thrown those principles away. I cannot stand for that, so I am out here to tell you the truth, and that is the only reason in the world that I am going around the country and putting these facts out. I was there, and I can tell you what those facts are; and I know that the people of GPE know me, and they believe me when I tell them the truth. And I want you to do some thinking. I want you to take the situation with which we are faced right now. I want you to study the facts. I want you to look at the record. I want you to find out just exactly the record in ORG of these NORP Congressmen, and the record in ORG of the NORP Congressmen. That is the policy on which you can base your vote. Then when you have done that, I am going to ask you to go home and pray over it think about the welfare of this Nation, think about your own welfare, think about the welfare of the free nations of the world, and think of the peace of the world. All I have worked for for DATE has been peace, and to prevent a third world war. And every policy I have pursued has been with that end in view. I want that policy continued, and in order to get that policy continued, I want you to send PERSON and PERSON to GPE as President and Vice President of GPE. It has been DATE coming through New England. I have enjoyed the scenery, but as you may have heard, I did not come on this trip to look at scenery. I am out here on a campaign trip, working as hard as I can for a NORP victory in DATE. You have a very, very fine slate of NORP candidates running for office here in GPE. You have just been introduced to them. Now you should, for your own welfare and benefit, send PERSON to the ORG, PERSON to the ORG, and PERSON to the Governor's chair again. Now I hope I hope most sincerely that you are getting acquainted with the NORP candidate for President, PERSON. Governor PERSON is coming back to New England in DATE now, and I hope you will see him and hear him as often as you possibly can.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: He is the finest new leader to come along since PERSON back in DATE. He is talking sense to the NORP people. And when you hear him, you will know as I do that he is a man you can trust. I want to tell you some things you ought to know about PERSON fine record as Governor of GPE, but before I do that, I would like to read you an article someone sent me DATE from your local paper, ORG for DATE. I see you have the same opinion of ORG that I have of ORG. But sometimes, my friends, sometimes these awful newspapers have to print the truth, and this is CARDINAL time it did. CARDINAL in social security checks were mailed to GPE DATE. Then the article goes on to say, DATE will bring increased social security checks to CARDINAL people in greater GPE. CARDINAL, not CARDINAL DATE benefit checks mailed during DATE will amount to MONEY. Increases of MONEY each month will go to most retired workers who receive old-age insurance payments. Now I am glad these insurance benefits are being paid, but there is a story behind them I think you ought to know. For it is a good example of exactly what this election is all about. All the people who are getting these benefits have of course been paying premiums into the ORG for DATE. And the amounts they and their employers paid in, turned out to be larger than were needed to finance the benefits paid out at the old rate. So extra money was piling up in the ORG's insurance account. And DATE, I asked the ORG to raise the benefit rates and give this money back to the people who were receiving insurance benefits. It seemed to me that this was only fair-and a good way to help compensate for increases in the cost of living. The NORP in ORG thought so, too. Our great Majority Leader, PERSON, was one of those who helped to get action. And in DATE a social security bill, including this change and some other improvements, came up for a vote on the floor of ORG. The great majority of NORP voted for it, of course, but CARDINAL of the NORP voted against it, and the bill failed to pass. Well, PERSON and some others, would not take No for an answer.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: They brought the bill up again DATE. And they turned the spotlight on the NORP, who got a lot of heat, I am glad to say. Some of those NORP got scared and enough of them changed their votes to let the bill go through this second time. The ORG passed it, too. I signed it with great pleasure. And CARDINAL people here in GPE are now getting the benefit. But they would never have gotten a thing if the NORP had had their way and do not you forget it. Now I tell you the story because the NORP candidate for President spoke in GPE DATE and claimed that his party was in favor of improving and extending social security. He asserted, and I quote him directly, The social security law was a bipartisan law to meet a need which had become urgent in the depression. You see, he is starting to say me too it is pretty late in this campaign, though, to start that, and I do not want you to believe it. In the first place, the social security law was not a bipartisan law. The NORP fought tooth and toenail against the original social security law in DATE, and I was in the ORG and I know what I am talking about. They voted CARDINAL to CARDINAL to recommit the bill in ORG. That was the real test in the ORG. Of course, when we licked them on that, they strung along and voted to pass the bill. So now they claim they helped to start social security. They did not do anything of the kind. In DATE the NORP candidate for President you remember him, PERSON campaigned against social security. He called it a cruel hoax. In the 80th, good-for-ORG ORG, the NORP took social security protection away from CARDINAL people. And in DATE when the NORP put through a great expansion of the social security program, most of the NORP hampered and obstructed and fought against the very improvements their candidate now hints he might be for. You cannot afford to be fooled by this me too line. ORG in ORG has a solid record of opposition to social security. Not so long ago, their candidate did not have much use for it, either. DATE, before he became a NORP politician, he was going around the country saying, If all that NORP want is security, they can go to prison.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: They will have enough to eat, they will have a bed to sleep on, they will have a roof over their heads. When you hear the NORP make promises at campaign time, you had better look at their record, and you had better find out how that General feels deep down in his heart. Look into these things, not just on social security but on all the things you want and need, and are entitled to. Do that, my friends, and I am out here to try and get you to think. I am out here trying to get you to look at the record. I am out here to get you to look at the record of the NORP in ORG, and the NORP in ORG, and then make up your mind on what is best for you, and what is best for this great GPE of ours, and what is best for the free world. And all I ask you to do is to inform yourselves and vote intelligently. You know, the power of this great Republic rests with you, and that power is exercised on DATE. When you neglect to do that, when you neglect to register, when you neglect to vote, and you get bad government, you have got nobody to blame but yourselves, and you get just what you ought to get. I am begging you I am praying with you to use your best judgment for your own welfare, for the welfare of the greatest Nation in the history of the world, and for peace in the world to come. I am asking you to vote to see the greatest age in the history of the world, if you have the right kind of government. And in order to do that, you have got to put forward-looking people in office. And I want to say to you young people that we are faced with the greatest opportunity, we are faced with the greatest age in the history of the world. And we have to have forward-looking people to make that age work for your benefit, and for the benefit of all the people of this great Nation. And you cannot do that if you put people in charge of the Federal government who want to turn the clock back to DATE. Now to do this, after you have satisfied yourselves that it is right for you, and right for the Republic, go to the polls on DATE, and vote the NORP ticket, and you will have DATE of good government and forward-looking government.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: I am very happy to stop here in GPE TIME, because I am told that this county has voted NORP in presidential elections ever since DATE. That shows that you are a very sensible people, and I am always happy to be among good NORP. I do not know whether you know it or not, or whether you have suspected it, but I am out campaigning to elect a NORP ticket this fall. I have enjoyed meeting your candidates here in GPE. I am glad you have a good NORP running for Governor DATE, because I expect poor PERSON will be a nervous wreck after he gets off that campaign train he is on now. DATE ORG has a candidate for President, CARDINAL of the finest men to serve in public life in this generation-PERSON. He is a man of integrity and conviction, and as Governor of GPE he has proved his abilities as a civilian administrator, and he will make a great President. I have been traveling all across this country and back, from coast to coast, explaining to the people the main issues in this campaign. When you come right down to it, the big issue shows up in the basic differences between our CARDINAL parties. ORG has always been the party with a heart for the people. With us the people come first. With ORG, property and profits come first, and come ahead of the people. You people in this city have had firsthand experience with the way this NORP approach works against the people. You have been losing some of your textile mills, and one of the reasons is the Taft-Hartley law passed by the NORP 80th ORG. That act has almost stopped the growth of unions. It has made it easy for employers in non-unionized parts of the country to use every trick in the book to keep workers from organizing and obtaining better wages. That way, wages in other places have been kept down below what you have had to pay here, and this has made is very attractive for the textile companies to move out of New England. Now you might as well make up your minds that the Taft-Hartley Act and all the trouble it has caused is just small change alongside of the damage the NORP would bring about if they got control of both ORG and the ORG. They have been talking about giving you a change, but it would not be the kind of change you want or would like to have.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: Social security, farm price supports, rural electrification, and other New Deal and fair Deal programs for the benefit of the workers and the farmer would be sabotaged one way or another. That may sound like a pretty strong statement, but it can be backed up by the record the voting record of the NORP in ORG. That is what the NORP did in the Both ORG when they had control. In DATE, they have not reformed. In fact, in their platform DATE in their platform they endorsed that good-for-nothing, do-nothing 80th ORG that I talked so much about in DATE. They endorsed all it did. For DATE now they have been fighting these forward-looking programs that the NORP stand for, and they want to put the NORP out of FAC so they can undo most of what the New Deal and fair PERSON has done for the people. DATE they thought they had their chance by putting up as their candidate for President a great military hero. They figured his popularity would cover up the black record of the Old Guard NORP. But the General has made it clear that he is taking orders from the same old bunch of ORG NORP. I do not think the people of this country are going to be tricked or fooled into voting for a CARDINAL-star general who is just fronting for the worst elements in ORG. I came out here on this trip and the other one which I took West to try and inform everybody exactly what this election means. This is one of the most important elections in the history of the country. This election will decide whether we are going to go forward into the greatest age in the history of the world, or whether we are going to try to turn the clock back to DATE. Now you you people make up the Government. You control the Government. It is your privilege to exercise that control on DATE. The Constitution of the United States provides that the power of government in this Republic rests with the people-with you. I want you to do some thinking. I want you to think these things over. I want you to study the record. I want you to study the record of the NORP in ORG. I want you to study the record of the NORP in ORG, and then when you have done that, I want you to make up your minds in your own interests. I want you to make up your minds for the welfare of the greatest Republic in the history of the world.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform and Other Informal Remarks in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire

text: I appreciate it most highly. I remember how cordial you were when I came here in DATE, and I shall never forget it. I think I told you then about how my grandfather came out here with an ox train load of merchandise, and how PERSON helped him out. And since that time the records have been examined and the church files show that it actually happened just as I told it. He had the first train of his own loaded with merchandise for the ENTITY, and when he got here the colonel in charge of the post had another freighter that he wanted to hold and he would not accept my grandfather's load of goods. And it almost broke him, and if it had not been for PERSON it would have broke him--but they worked it out and everybody was happy except the colonel in charge of the post. I have been making this trip to campaign for ORG. I am happy to do that, because I think you suspect by this time that I am a good NORP. I believe with all my heart that it is in the best interests of the country for the NORP to win this election. I think we are going to win it. We are going to win on the basis of our record, our platform, and our candidates. On each of these things, when you compare the NORP situation with the NORP situation, the NORP look so much better that there is no difficulty whatever to make a choice. ORG has been giving the country good government for DATE. At home the country is in better shape than it ever has been. Abroad, we are making good progress in building up our defenses against the terrible threat of NORP aggression. At home and abroad, ORG has been against almost every forward-looking proposal that we have made in DATE. Now they are trying to rewrite history, but I am not going to let them get away with it. I have been reading the record on them, and I am going to keep it up, and tell the people exactly what the facts are. You see, nearly every place I go, somebody in the crowd around the street will let out a yell Give 'em hell, PERSON. Well now, I do not strive for a reputation of that kind. I tell the truth on them, and that is a lot better for the country than giving them hell, because they cannot stand the truth. I hope every one of you will have an opportunity to read the NORP platform, and the NORP platform, too.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: They will show you what the difference is between the CARDINAL parties. I think we have the best platform any political party ever adopted, and think the NORP platform is about the worst one I ever read. Along with everything else they even endorsed that do-nothing 80th ORG. You remember it? TIME, I told ORG that I was going to call a special session of ORG and see whether the NORP in the 80th ORG would put their platform into effect. Oh, they had a platform that was intended to appeal to everybody in the country, so I called them together and they met for DATE and did not do a thing. I knew that was exactly what they would do--because they never do expect to carry out a platform even when it is good, but this one is so bad they cannot carry it out. If they were to win this election, you could count on them giving you the same sort of treatment you had from that 80th ORG-which won the election in DATE for me. I told you when I was here in DATE what the NORP had been trying to do to your reclamation and power programs. They have been trying to do the same ever since-and you cannot trust them. The NORP have it all over the NORP in the case of candidates--just like we do everything else. And I do not know of any place where that is clearer than it is here in GPE. You have a fine NORP candidate here for GPE Senator--PERSON. PERSON has made a wonderful record in ORG, and if you will send him to the ORG, you will have somebody there who will look out for your interests. Now I have known Mr. PERSON for I do not know how long--15 or DATE-and he has always been on the side of the people. You need a man like that in the ORG worse than ever now--I will say you need him from this State. For ORG you have Mrs. PERSON. Judge PERSON has also made a grand record in ORG. This is especially true on reclamation matters. If you send her back to ORG, and send PERSON to the ORG, you will have a very effective team to work for you on the reclamation projects that mean so much to this great western country. I also hope very much that you will promote your mayor, PERSON, to be Governor of this great State of GPE.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: I hope you will also send that good NORP that was just introduced to you, Mr. PERSON, to ORG. He impresses me as being a wonderful man. The best thing, you know, for your own safety, is to just vote the NORP ticket and send them all in. I urge you most strongly to vote for our candidate for President and Vice PresidentPERSON and PERSON. I think it would be a tragedy for the present NORP candidate to be elected President of GPE. He has been a great general, but he has already shown in this campaign that he cannot be depended on to master the great political issues with which we are faced. He has surrendered to the most reactionary elements of ORG. He is not the kind of man we ought to have for President. Now I like him. I made him Chief of Staff of the GPE ENTITY. I sent him to Europe to command the ORG military setup, and I have every confidence in him as a military man. But as President and politician, he would not know what to do. Now, on the other hand, I am more than ever impressed DATE with what PERSON offers to the ORG. He is talking sense to the NORP people. And he will not be taken in by any special interest lobby. If you elect him and a NORP ORG, the country will be safe for DATE. Again I want to thank you very much for this most cordial welcome. I appreciate that greeting very, very much. I am glad to be back here in GPE once more. I was here in DATE and gave you some down to earth facts about that good for-nothing, do-nothing NORP 80th ORG, if you remember. Then you did your duty at the polls, and I want to congratulate you on the way you voted. I understand GPE had the best record of any county in GPE in the vote you gave ORG in DATE. And I hope you will repeat that again. I am sure you will do it over in DATE, and send PERSON to ORG. I have always been interested in the way your good town got its name. They tell me that FAC was named for the helper engines that pull the train up these wonderful mountains you have around here. You know, I think ORG needs some helper engines.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: It would take a whole roundhouse full of these helpers to get them elected DATE, with their terrible record holding them back. As for their candidate for President, I do not think helper engines can get him out of the trouble he is in now. With the crew he has got around him, I do not think he will ever be elected. I just do not think the people are going to elect a President who has surrendered to PERSON and PERSON and PERSON and PERSON. I am glad to come to your GPE and tell you that I am proud of the NORP candidate for GPE Senator. GPE has a wonderful man in PERSON. He has been one of the best Members of ORG for DATE, and I know he is going to make a great GPE Senator. Your candidate for ORG, Mr. PERSON, knows the importance of using our national resources for the benefit of all the people, instead of just the special interests. I met Mr. PERSON TIME, the present mayor of GPE--he was there to welcome me, and I understand he is going to be the next Governor of GPE. Now when you vote for President and Vice President, remember that this country has never had CARDINAL better candidates than PERSON and PERSON. They have shown by their record that they stand for the interests of the common everyday man. I want to tell you this, too. They are telling the truth in this campaign. They are not like some NORP politicians who are running around distorting the facts and trying to rewrite history. You can count on PERSON and PERSON to continue the prosperity you now have. You people here in Price Canyon area know the importance of steady employment. DATE, when the NORP people voted the NORP out of office, there were CARDINAL people out of work in this country. But DATE our country is working full blast, with CARDINAL people in good jobs. I told the students up at ORG in GPE TIME that in DATE when they were graduating, they did not know where to go for jobs. There were CARDINAL people out of jobs, and the graduates of that university would be lucky if they got a job at MONEY a day.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: And then I read them an extract from a piece in ORG about the graduation of DATE from colleges, in which it was said the students now have so many jobs to pick from, they do not know which one to take. Now I think you had better keep up that situation. And the reason you can do that is because ORG has courage. This thing did not come about by accident. ORG has had the courage, the wisdom, and the faith to make our economy work in a way that all NORP, not just a special few, could enjoy prosperity and full employment. Our policy is for the people. ORG policy is the welfare and benefit of all the people, not just a few. Compare the terrible NORP record and the terrible NORP platform DATE with the NORP record and with the NORP platform DATE, and you cannot possibly go wrong because you will vote the NORP ticket. You will only come to CARDINAL conclusion. Vote your own interests--that is what you are doing. You see, the power of the Government in this country is in the people, and the people exercise that power by voting. You go to the polls and vote for your own interests--vote for the welfare of this great Nation, and vote for peace in the world, by voting the NORP ticket, and the country will be safe for DATE. I appreciate it very much--very much indeed this introduction, and I am particularly happy over that synthetic truth brigade that is supposed to be following me. You know, I was shadowed in DATE by somebody, and now I am being shadowed again. We are telling the truth on them, and that really hurts. I am here in one of my many jobs--campaigning as a leader of ORG. It is good to come to a NORP place like this. You gave me a good big majority in DATE. You have been NORP since DATE. You have a good NORP representing you in ORG--PERSON. Awhile ago when I heard your national committeeman introduce PERSON, I did not know who he was talking about. I know him as PERSON, and I think he is all right, and he will make you a good Governor. I have known him a long, long time. PERSON is a go-getter, and he will be an asset to GPE and to you. Now I want to call your attention particularly to our candidates for President and Vice President.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: I do not think that we have ever had abler men to head the NORP ticket than we have in PERSON and PERSON. They are both men of experience in government. They are both liberal-minded gentlemen, and they will carry on this great Government of ours in the manner in which it ought to be carried on. And you must elect them in DATE. I am glad to see the great progress this area is making. I have been reading a copy of your good newspaper just as I came along here. I have been in politics for DATE, and in elective public office for DATE, and down in GPE there are CARDINAL metropolitan papers, and I never had one for me in my whole life. If they did get for me, I would know I was wrong. I wish we had newspapers like that in GPE. We need them. In most places I visit, the newspapers are against the NORP. But your paper is a good one, and I am happy to say that about your newspaper. Your paper told of the progress you are making--when most papers keep telling the people how bad things are. If you listen to most of them, you would think the country is just on the verge of ruin. There are more animals in the county DATE, as compared with last; there are more acres of bearing orchard and more acres of meadow hay; people own more household furniture; stocks of merchandise are greater; there is more farm equipment, except combines; there has been a great deal of building and improvements; and mining is on the increase. Well now, that is an awful situation for the NORP to have to swallow in DATE. In addition to this, I understand you have a fine new veterans hospital here that will be of great value to this whole area. I congratulate you on that record. You are especially fortunate here, but we are having the same sort of situation all over GPE. This prosperity of ours is driving the NORP politicians almost crazy. That is the reason for those CARDINAL little men following me. They cannot stand to see the country so well off under a NORP administration. I was reading a speech by the NORP candidate for President DATE. He was doing his best to prove that this prosperity did not exist--that it was all done with mirrors, according to him.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: Do you want to stand still, mired in the mud of this New Deal prosperity, or do you want to march down the shining corridor of progress to the NORP idea of prosperity? Well, what do you think? I know what I think, and I know I am pouring it on them so you will not have to. Do you want to march off under the orders of the NORP general, down that shining corridor --whatever that is--or would you just as soon stay behind, stuck in the mud of this terrible New Deal prosperity ? The last time the NORP marched off with us we were a long time getting back where we belonged. DATE is DATE of your community chest drive, and I hope you will take a little of that prosperity and give it to help others who need it. CARDINAL of the things that the NORP are saying is that this prosperity is due to the defense program, and to the fighting in GPE. Do not you believe it. If we did not have the defense program, we would be even more prosperous. We would have a lot of things that we are holding back on now, because of defense. That is true of the atomic energy programs, too. We are developing peaceful uses for the atom--like the submarine I started DATE in GPE, that has an atomic engine in it. If it were not for defense, we could go ahead much faster with the peaceful uses of the atom, and of the uranium that you are mining around here in this GPE. They tell me that the independent uranium producers who are doing so much to get this ore out, are running into difficulties with existing Government procedures. I am going to look into that matter when I get back to GPE and see if it cannot be straightened out, and in a way that will give the little fellow a square break. I am always for the little man. If you look over the NORP policy, you will find that they are for property. The NORP policy is for people. I think the people come first, then the property will take care of itself. We are working for peace. That is what our defense program is for. And with God's help we will get it. At least, we will have more prosperity if you do not elect the NORP so they can bring on another depression. Your Government under ORG has worked with you to create the prosperity we now have--and we will keep on doing just that.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: CARDINAL of the things we hope to do in the future is this Upper Colorado River storage project. This will do a tremendous lot for the whole area. The Secretary of the Interior is working on the planning of this project now, so that the dams can be built in such a way as not to damage the Dinosaur National Monument. In fact, it ought to be enlarged. After this election, we will enlarge it to accommodate the dinosaur wing of the whole ORG. We will fill it up with the old NORP fossils. Then maybe we could change the name of it to FAC. They are still living so far in the past that they never in the world will catch up with the progress of this great GPE of ours. You cannot count on the NORP to continue the progress we are making. They are always obstructing measures for the good of the people. And I want you to do something for me. I want you to get out the record and read it, find out just how many projects they tried to sabotage, find out their record on everything that has been for the welfare and benefit of this country; and you will find that the majority of the NORP in ORG were against them every single time. If you read the record, you will not have any trouble whatever about making up your mind. It is in fine print, and it is the dullest document that was ever published in the history of the world. But it has the facts and the figures in it, and if you are interested in the welfare of your country, you will read that record, and then you will vote for yourselves on DATE. The people of this country have the power that makes the Government. And when you exercise that franchise, you put the people in there who are to run your Government. And when you do not vote, and when you do not do your duty, you get just the kind of government you deserve. Now, do not forget, on DATE, go to the polls and vote for PERSON, and this whole NORP ticket here in GPE and the country will be safe DATE. I appreciate very much that welcome, You know, when I was here in DATE, we just went through. I would not let them do it this time, because I wanted particularly to tell that band how much I appreciated them getting up at TIME and coming to serenade the President down here QUANTITY to the next stop.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: The group showed a real and unselfish interest in the Government. If the voters of GPE and those of the country exercised the patriotism and initiative of young people like these, we would not have to urge constantly that they exercise their right to vote. Everybody ought to take it on himself to vote. There has been a rumor going around that I am out doing some campaigning for the NORP ticket. That is my privilege as head of ORG. I am trying to tell you what the facts are and I want you to use your own judgment. That seems to worry a lot of the NORP for some reason. I just want to tell them this is only the beginning. A lot more of them will be worried before I finish reading the terrible NORP record to the NORP people from one end of this country to the other. I am out here because I believe that world peace, domestic prosperity, and the principles of justice and decency will be served better by the election of a NORP ticket. That is just what you are going to do on DATE. Here in this district, you have been ably represented by Congressman PERSON. He has done a good job for western GPE, and I know you will elect him again for another term. I have known PERSON for DATE. He will make you a good Governor, one that you will be proud of, and I hope you will elect him, too--and I know you will. DATE ORG has at the head of the ticket CARDINAL of the best candidates this country has ever produced--PERSON and PERSON. PERSON and PERSON understand the problems of the little fellow, and they understand the problems of the West. They know that locked in the hills of western GPE you have some of the most valuable natural resources to be found any place in the Nation. They know that these resources must be developed for all the people, and not just for the special interests. An example of the way to do this is the ORG project for developing gasoline and oil products from coal and oil shale. There are QUANTITY in this area north and west of GPE where beds of oil shale, QUANTITY thick, will yield an average of QUANTITY or more of oil per ton of shale. This project promises to open up a vast new era of industrial expansion. This is a wonderful example of the way the Government can undertake experimental work and develop resources from which all the people will benefit.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: But the NORP are wildly running around the country trying to fool the people into believing that projects like these are socialism. They say the power dams, reclamation projects, and the whole development of this mountain area should not be carried forward by your own ORG for your own benefit. And now the NORP candidate has caved in to the power lobby. He is going around, too, claiming that the Government projects represent a philosophy of the left -whatever that is--and that they are regimenting people and destroying liberty. Well, I have been looking into this subject as I have traveled around the country for DATE, and I have met CARDINAL of wonderful people, and I have not seen anybody in slavery. Nobody has complained to me about having his liberty destroyed. So, do not be fooled by this gloomy poppycock the NORP are spreading. Vote for the party that believes in you, and believes in the future development and the prosperity of this great country. You yourselves are the Government of this country. The people are the Government, and the way they exercise the powers of government is at the polls on DATE. It is your duty to go to the polls and vote for yourselves. Vote for PERSON and PERSON, and the whole NORP ticket, and you will have DATE of good government all across the country. I appreciate that, and I am greatly enjoying this trip through GPE. TIME, and I did not think anybody would be up at that time of day, but the people turned out. They wanted to hear the facts and they wanted to listen--and I see you are doing it better at TIME, and I appreciate it more than I can tell you. I have enjoyed the visit with your Congressman, PERSON, about your progress out here, and your problems. Be sure and send him back to ORG because he has GPE's interests at heart, and he does his job as well as any Congressman in the ORG. And I would like very much to see you vote for PERSON. I have known him a long time, and he is a good man and he will make you a good Governor.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: My principal interest in being out here, however, is to get you to understand some of the issues of this campaign, and understand also that the NORP have nominated a man to head the ticket, and a man for Vice President--CARDINAL men who are unbearable so far as ability and honor and everything else is concerned--they will never have better candidates for ORG than PERSON, and PERSON. You will make no mistake voting for them. I am not running for office this time--I did not know whether you knew that or not-but I am going to leave ORG in good hands. PERSON is one of the best qualified men ever to run for President. He has been a great Governor of a great GPE, and he has a lot of experience in foreign affairs. PERSON is one of the best men that the ORG has ever had there--and I spent DATE in the ORG myself, so you know I am paying him a high compliment. CARDINAL of the things that is most important to your progress and prosperity out here is the NORP program of reclamation and power projects. I have been telling the people in the West that ORG is against these projects, and I have been exposing the record, showing how the NORP in ORG have voted to hinder and obstruct and slash appropriations for these great dams and irrigation systems and powerlines. A NORP spokesman piped up DATE, and said this was unfair--that a NORP started the reclamation program. That is right, it was a NORP-Theodore PERSON, back in DATE, who started it. He was a NORP who had a great sympathy for the West. And you know what happened to him? He was thrown out of ORG by the Wall Street bankers. He had to go out and set up a party of his own--ORG. And the special interest groups have run ORG ever since. ORG always kicks out its liberals, or whips them into line. I could tell you a lot about this, and I will before this campaign is over. The reason ORG cannot really be in favor of reclamation and public power, is that they let the private power lobby write their policies for them. The private power lobby has been spending MONEY to persuade the people that everything from ORG to GPE is creeping socialism. So naturally, the NORP have to call it the same thing.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: It is a good NORP program of developing the resources of the people for the benefit of the people. And ORG has been doing things through ORG, and getting it done, in spite of the NORP opposition CARDINAL of the best things for this whole part of GPE would be the proposed Colorado River storage project. It would bring more electric power and new and bigger industries to this area. It would mean QUANTITY of new irrigated land, and more water for farms. The plans for this project are just about complete. They are being drawn up in ORG, under the Secretary of the Interior, Mr. PERSON. I do not have to tell you people here in GPE about your fellow citizen, PERSON. He is one of the greatest friends the people of the West ever had. After PERSON has approved these plans for the Upper Colorado River storage project, they come to ORG. They have to be approved by the President, and then they go to ORG. Now, I will not be President when that project gets to FAC, and I cannot make any promises for the man who will be there; but I can tell you this, if Governor PERSON is the President, it will be considered on its merits and decided in the best interests of the people. And his decision will not be dictated by the private power lobby. And that is a lot more than I can say for the NORP candidate. I am afraid he might say that this project is applying the philosophy of the left to the Government--and it might help the housewife get the dishes washed--so he will be against it. And that is what he has been saying about some of the ORG dams and power projects that are under construction and have been built in these areas. If you want that Upper Colorado storage project, you had better vote NORP. Some of you were a little careless up here in DATE, and did not vote the NORP ticket. The situation is of vital importance to the welfare of the country, and I tell all the people, when I talk to them, that their interests are at stake. You yourselves are the ones who have the interest in this election. When you vote on DATE you vote for yourselves, because you are the Government.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Rear Platform Remarks in Utah and Colorado

text: Boy, he was hot to-Thank you, Chairman PERSON, for your TIME, was not he? And thank you, Senator PERSON, for being here with us TIME and for your work on this event and for your steadfast effort to get a health care bill out of ORG that actually protects the NORP people's health care. And I want to ask all of you here to help him be reelected to the ORG in GPE DATE. We need him back there. In addition to all the dignitaries from GPE, I understand that we have CARDINAL NORP congressional candidates from GPE, and maybe you could raise your hands. Shine a light on that man; he is running for office. There you are, PERSON, it is good to see you. Ladies and gentlemen, when I was nominated for President by Governor PERSON, I thought he gave one of the best speeches I ever heard. And about halfway through it, I looked at PERSON and I said, Who is he talking about anyway? By the time he got through that speech, I felt like a real President. And TIME I am also in his debt for his wonderful words, for his profound way of telling the truth, for his leadership in GPE, and for his love for GPE. People ask me sometimes kind of cynics, who do not know what it is like to really love where you are from how PERSON could be doing this again. And I said, I may be the only person in GPE that understands this, but if I had not been just absolutely obsessed with the direction the country was taking in DATE and convinced it was wrong, I'd still be Governor of my GPE. It is the best job in the world if you are lucky enough to be in a place where you love. And he loves this State. He loves you, and you ought to keep him doing what he is doing. I also want to say, I am glad to see all the musicians here with all their talent. I hope I get to hear a little music before I have to go TIME. But there is really nothing for me to say; PERSON said it all. Ditto, I could say. Let me say the stakes DATE are very high because they will determine the extent to which and the shape of our continued forward progress. When I was elected President, we'd had DATE of exploding deficits.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Remarks at a Democratic National Committee Reception in New York City

text: And I knew we had to bring the deficit down, we had to bring interest rates down, we had to get investment up in our people, we had to put the NORP people first again. And we came up with a plan, with the help of a lot of people from GPE, including my National Economic Adviser, PERSON, that would do those things. And when I say well, maybe it sounds good but it is not human sometimes to say, we had the biggest deficit reduction in history; we are going to have DATE of deficit reduction in a row for the first time since PERSON was President of GPE; we have had CARDINAL budgets passed on time for the first time in DATE; DATE we had DATE without a Presidential veto in DATE. And you say, well, what does all that mean? CARDINAL of your fellow NORP have jobs that they did not have. That is what it means. CARDINAL NORP taxpayers with children, who work for a living, are going to get an income tax cut out of our economic plan, so they will be encouraged to stay working and not go on welfare CARDINAL of them. CARDINAL students are eligible, CARDINAL students are eligible for low-interest-rate loans and better repayment terms under the student loan program because we changed that, so no one will ever have an excuse that The cost is too much, and I cannot go to college again. PERCENT of the small businesses in this country, under that economic program, were eligible for a tax cut. All they had to do was invest more money in their business, hire more people, and make this economy grow. CARDINAL NORP refinanced their homes because the interest rates went down. I just came back from GPE; in DATE they lost CARDINAL jobs. In DATE of our administration, they gained CARDINAL as automobiles in GPE came back. That is what it means. How many CARDINAL people, we will never know, under the Family and Medical Leave Act, are now able to take a little time off when their baby's born or when their parents are sick? We know that CARDINAL of lives will be saved because of the Brady bill. We know that; we have evidence of that.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Remarks at a Democratic National Committee Reception in New York City

text: We know that because of that assault weapons ban, police will be able to go out on the street with a little more confidence that they will not be outgunned by the people they are supposed to protect the rest of us from. We know that. These are real things that affect the real lives of real people. It is not easy to break habits of gridlock that, frankly, are the province not just of the other party, which says no a lot of the time, but of the cumbersome procedures which grip GPE. But we have been working on it. The world trade agreement, GATT, hung around for DATE. We are going to ratify it DATE. The family leave law hung around for DATE and got vetoed twice . The PERSON bill took DATE, but it passed. The assault weapons ban to give you an idea of how difficult change is, we had for the assault weapons ban, all the living former Presidents, every police organization in GPE, and this President working as hard as he could, and we beat the ORG by CARDINAL votes. But we are doing it. We are breaking gridlock. We are making changes. It is affecting people's lives in ways that are profound and important. And a lot of it involves not just the Government doing something for somebody but empowering people to do something for themselves. Governor PERSON's son, PERSON, now a leader and Assistant Secretary of ORG, has been a leader in empowering people, starting with the homeless to the people in public housing, to live safe, constructive lives. We are trying to change the rules. No more Government handouts but Government handups, real partnerships, real community building, really trying to help people take control of their own lives. These things matter to real people. And the NORP people are beginning to sense this. And the more they sense it, the more we will be able to cut through the fog and let the clear sky show and the more we will be able to run on what we have done for the NORP people to help them help themselves. It is going to make a real difference in the life of this country. NORP have a well-known cynicism for Government. My senior Senator back home used to say that CARDINAL the NORP people are convinced the Government would mess up a CARDINAL-car parade. But you know something? We do some things pretty well. The NORP talked about bringing down the deficit. We did it.
label: monologic

metadata.title: Remarks at a Democratic National Committee Reception in New York City

text: They talked about generating economic growth. We contributed to that. They talked about having less Government. You know, they always complained about that. But when our budgets are implemented, we will reduce over DATE ORG by CARDINAL people, not by firing people but by attrition. We will use all the savings to pay for that crime bill to put another CARDINAL police officers on the streets of GPE and the other cities of this country. We will have the smallest ORG since PERSON was President. It will be producing more work, and the NORP people will be safer on their streets. That is the kind of thing that we ought to do. We can make Government work for ordinary people in ways that make sense and change lives. But let me say, everything I have tried to do to empower people to get the economy going, to make Government work for ordinary people again, all of those things are embodied in this struggle to provide health care to all NORP. People have been trying to do it for DATE. PERSON wanted to do it; PERSON wanted to do it. President PERSON President PERSON proposed requiring employers and employees to buy health insurance. President PERSON tried to do it. We have worked for DATE and DATE and DATE. We worked for DATE and involved CARDINAL of people to put together a proposal. It will not be right for everybody. Surely, there is some things that can be improved about it. I went out and listened to the NORP people. They said, do a little more for small business and make sure you are going to protect small business, and make it a little less regulatory. And trust the NORP people to take more voluntary actions at work, but make sure you cover everybody. So we made some changes, and we did that. And there are now bills on the floor of the ORG and the ORG for the first time ever in the whole history of the Republic that would cover all NORP with health care. But the forces of opposition are very strong. We were talking at dinner how the great NORP political theorist, PERSON, said DATE there was nothing so difficult in all of human affairs than to change the established order of things. Because the people that lose know it, and they fight you like crazy. And the people that are going to win are never quite sure you can deliver the goods. And so they are often not there in the trenches.
label: monologic
